reviewText: This is a good collection of films with Morgan Freeman as Dr. Alex Cross.  Along Came a Spider is the better of thetwo.  The second film, Kiss the Girls benefits from Ashley Judd's performance.  Overall, this is a very good purchaseand for a small cost.  Besides, Morgan Freeman brings a rare and wonderful quality to the films he does, makingthem very entertaining and enjoyable to see.
Title: Kiss The Girls / Along Came A Spider

reviewText: The movies themselves were great if you didn't read the books first.  (The books were the best.)  Because I did read the books, I was disappointed that the movies barely followed the original stories.  Morgan Freeman, of course, was excellent as always.
Title: Kiss The Girls / Along Came A Spider

reviewText: I do, indeed, love these two movies.  They totally keep you on the edge of your seat. I've watched them prob'ly 3 times each and will, undoubtably watch them many more times over the years. Well written, well acted, well done!
Title: Kiss The Girls / Along Came A Spider

reviewText: I think Morgan Freeman is one of the best actors around at this time and I have yet to see him in a movie I didn't enjoy.  The plots are good with twists.
Title: Kiss The Girls / Along Came A Spider

reviewText: I love everything about this movie. The plot is wonderful!!!! I stayed glued to the television two thumbs up for me
Title: Kiss The Girls / Along Came A Spider

reviewText: I gave this a 4-star because of the first movie: KISS THE GIRLS. I haven't read the book(s), so I don't know if they stayed true to them or not, but Mr. Patterson did enjoy the movie. At the beginning there is so much "hop-scotching" going on that it makes it difficult to follow the action and why they need to overuse the mobile camera and keep circling the actors  as the Indians did with the wagon trains of old, is beyond me. Once or twice, most of us can get the picture.  Now ALONG CAME A SPIDER was  directed much better and it made for a greater movie. It is sad that HELL-LYWOOD (not Hollywood anymore) needs to use such vulgar language that is only suited for our high-ranking politicians nowadays, as they will still get the "R" rating from the violence, which thankfully is not gory as in far too many movies. Both movie plots were very good and they will keep you guessing on who the real villains are. In KISS THE GIRLS, the ending scenes were NOT very real, as there is suppose to be a live gas line disconnected and nobody shuts the gas off!! If they cleaned up the language, both movies would be okay for T.V.. The quality of the DVDs are great as usual.  +JMJ+
Title: Kiss The Girls / Along Came A Spider

reviewText: Enjoyed watching both, worth taking on a road trip.
Title: Kiss The Girls / Along Came A Spider

reviewText: Need I say more he has never been in a bad movie and this is among one of his best. Would advise as a great buy to everyone
Title: Kiss The Girls / Along Came A Spider
